Title: Relates to evidence of lost earnings or impaired earning capacity
Summary: Prohibits evidence concerning opinions, estimations, measures, or calculations of damages for lost earnings or impaired earning capacity resulting from personal injury or wrongful death shall not be reduced based on race, creed, color, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, sex, familial status, marital status, or status as a victim of domestic violence.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to evidence of lost earnings or impaired earning capacity
